description: Application for prior notification of development for change of use from offices (Class E) to 1 x 2-bed flat (Use Class C3).
decision_conditions: It has not been clearly and robustly demonstrated that the building has an independent office use, is not part of a mixed use of the site or alternatively that the building is not ancillary to the dwelling on the site. Consequently, under the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2021 [as amended], the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority is refused.

The proposal would result in poor living conditions and amenity for future occupants due to the insufficient provision of natural light to habitable rooms. Consequently, under the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2021 [as amended], the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority is refused.

The proposed two bedroom, 4 person flat has a gross internal floor space of 67mÂ², which doesn't meet the minimum standard of 70 square metres and fails to comply with the DCLG Technical Space Standards. Consequently, under the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2021 [as amended], the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority is refused.
